title: The Orc Captive Will Never Be Overthrown by the Elves - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Fantasy   Harem   Romance   School Life
tags: Dragons   Dwarfs   Elves   Fantasy World   Male Protagonist   Orcs

description: No, No, No, we orcs are also a civilized race, we don’t do things like humiliating Elf women… No, No, it is impossible to get pregnant if you make eye contact with us… I request you elves to not use your restricted books to make assumptions about our Orcs!>
